briefTitle: Adjuvant Endocrine Therapy in Early Stage Breast Cancer: Adherence and Clinical Outcome
officialTitle: Adjuvant Endocrine Therapy in Early Stage Breast Cancer: Impact of Drug Adherence/Persistence on Clinical Outcome in Various Breast Cancer Subtypes
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Medication Possession Ratio (MPR) as a proxy for medication adherence
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Luminal breast cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

Non-Luminal breast cancer
